analyzed: campā upānte vimala nalinī tīra paryanta vasī
śāstā pūrvam sakala bhuvana anugrahāya pravṛttaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ sparśa avagati rucinā
bhikṣuṇā ānanda nāmnā
garbha ārambhāt prabhṛti janatā janma vṛttim jagāda
śuklaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ śabala rucibhiḥ dehinām karma sūtraiḥ
citram loke bahutara daśam dṛśyate janma vastram
jīrṇasya api vyasana malina sneha līnaḥ prayatnaiḥ

original: yasyātyantaṃ cirapariṇater naiva niryāti rāgaḥ // KAvk_10.2 //
analyzed: yasya atyantam cira pariṇateḥ nā eva niryāti rāgaḥ

original: puṃsaḥ śukraṃ vigalitadhṛter ārtavaṃ yoṣitaś ca
analyzed: puṃsaḥ śukram vigalita dhṛteḥ ārtavam yoṣitaḥ ca
sparśa āveśa vyatikara juṣoḥ saṃgame saṃnipātāt

original: ekībhūtaṃ vrajati niyamāt kasya cid bījabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ekībhūtam vrajati niyamāt kasya cit bīja bhāvam

original: yo 'ntas tasmin bhavati sahasā saṃnikāṣe yathāgniḥ // KAvk_10.3 //
analyzed: yaḥ ntar tasmin bhavati sahasā saṃnikāṣe yathā agniḥ
rāga udgāraḥ sphaṭika śakalam megham ambhodhi pāthaḥ

original: puṣpāmodas tilaṃ iva śanaiḥ kāñcanaṃ vāgnitāpaḥ /
analyzed: puṣpa āmodaḥ tilam iva śanais kāñcanam vā agni tāpaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ garbhaṃ viśati niyatair apy asaṃlakṣyavṛttir
analyzed: saḥ yam garbham viśati niyataiḥ api a saṃlakṣya vṛttiḥ

original: vāyur gandhair iva bahuvidhaiḥ karmabhir vāsyamānaḥ // KAvk_10.4 //
analyzed: vāyuḥ gandhaiḥ iva bahuvidhaiḥ karmabhiḥ vāsyamānaḥ
tasmin sūkṣma krama pariṇatiḥ mīnaparyuṣṭake sau
nānā ākāra pracura racanā citra rūpaḥ pi alakṣyaḥ

original: kaṃ cit kālaṃ vahati vikṛtiṃ nirvikārāyamāno
analyzed: kam cit kālam vahati vikṛtim nirvikārāyamānaḥ

original: māyūrāṇḍe jalamaya iva vyaktabhaktir mayūraḥ // KAvk_10.5 //
analyzed: māyūra aṇḍe jala mayaḥ iva vyakta bhaktiḥ mayūraḥ
tatra ādhānāt ghana kala latā śalya peśī ādi avasthāḥ
tyaktvā tāḥ tāḥ jaṭhara janitena ūṣmaṇā pacyamānaḥ
pūrṇaiḥ māsaiḥ navabhiḥ athavā āvarta karma kramaḥ sau

original: kleśaṃ bhuṅkte kim api viṣamaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāprapannaḥ // KAvk_10.6 //
analyzed: kleśam bhuṅkte kim api viṣamam duḥkha saṃjñā prapannaḥ

original: kāle vṛntāt svayaṃ iva phalaṃ vicyutaṃ karmapākāt
analyzed: kāle vṛntāt svayam iva phalam vicyutam karma pākāt
tad kāla utthaiḥ avihata javaiḥ preritaḥ pūti vātaiḥ
lakṣya abhyāsa āyatana sacivaiḥ ācitaḥ karma bandhaiḥ

original: niryāty antaḥ śara iva dhanuryantraṇair yantramuktaḥ // KAvk_10.7 //
analyzed: niryāti antar śaraḥ iva dhanuḥ yantraṇaiḥ yantra muktaḥ
uttāna āsyaḥ sarala rasanaḥ cūcuka agram lihānaḥ

original: stanyaṃ mātuḥ pibati yad asau naiva karṇena nākṣṇā /
analyzed: stanyam mātuḥ pibati yat asau na eva karṇena na akṣṇā
janma abhyāsa vyasana yatana āyāsa saṃvāsalinā
sā tasya agre sakala kalanā deśini vāsanā eva
syūtaiḥ antar vividha viṣaya svāda saṃpāda bhedaiḥ
vyāptaḥ sūtaiḥ
bisa lavaḥ iva vyakta tantu pratānaiḥ
saḥ tha prakṛti sacivaiḥ indriyaiḥ datta samjñaḥ
stanya ālāpa ākṛti parimala sparśanaiḥ vetti dhātrīm
hasta ākarṣaiḥ śayana vasana āgharṣaṇaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ
sthāne sthāne taralita tanuḥ kīṭakaiḥ bhakṣyamāṇaḥ
nitya ākrandī vacana virahāt kāyikīm kleśa śailīm

original: kaṃ bobrūte viṣamavipadām āspadatvaṃ prayātaḥ // KAvk_10.10 //
analyzed: kam bobrūte viṣama vipadām āspada tvam prayātaḥ
pīḍā udvāntaiḥ churita vadanaḥ procchalat kṣīrapūraiḥ
uttāna uraḥ tala nipatitaiḥ ukṣitaḥ lakṣyate sau
māyā vadhvāḥ smaraṇa haraṇa prauḍha kelī vilāse
hāsena iva sphurita rucinā nirbhara vyāpta kāyaḥ
saḥ u tha prāpte lipi paricaye helayā datta haste
saṃsāre smin a vicalitayā bandha lekhya kriyāsu

original: janmāvartaṃ nijaṃ iva likhan dīrghaṃ oṃkāram ādau
analyzed: janma āvartam nijam iva likhan dīrgham oṃkāram ādau

original: varge varge vitarati matiṃ bhogasarge niviṣṭaḥ // KAvk_10.12 //
analyzed: varge varge vitarati matim bhoga sarge niviṣṭaḥ
prāpta prajñaḥ katham api galat bāla bhāva pramohaḥ

original: kāmautsukyāt punar api pare yauvane naṣṭasaṃjñaḥ /
analyzed: kāma autsukyāt punar api pare yauvane naṣṭa saṃjñaḥ
niḥsāreṣu vyasana vilasat megha saudāminīnām

original: badhnāty āsthāṃ sthirataradhiyā yoṣitāṃ vibhrameṣu // KAvk_10.13 //
analyzed: badhnāti āsthām sthiratara dhiyā yoṣitām vibhrameṣu

original: vāci śrotraṃ vapur api calāliṅganeṣv aṅganānāṃ
analyzed: vāci śrotram vapuḥ api cala āliṅganeṣu aṅganānām
ghrāṇam vaktra āsava parimale svādanam tad rase ca

original: pātre kurvan dṛśam api mukhe suptasarvakriyo 'sau
analyzed: pātre kurvan dṛśam api mukhe supta sarva kriyaḥ sau
dhatte mātram sarva indriyāṇi
dveṣṭi snigdham paricita paridveṣa śīlaḥ sa kāmī
vāñchati anyām nava nava rasaḥ sa prayatnaḥ nyakāmām
iti anyonya anucita carita alakṣya vailakṣya sākṣī
hāsyāya eva prakṛti virasaḥ citra tantraḥ sya kāmaḥ
alpa ādhāre viṣaya jaladhau majjataḥ sajjataḥ ca
bhraṣṭasya asya pratihata gateḥ kuñjarasya iva paṅke
kiṃkartavya avagati rahitā jāyate moha mūrcchā
nītasya āndhyam katipaya dina sthāyinā yauvanena
yāvatkālam bhramati calati prīyate jṛmbhate sau
smeram smeram vadati madana āliṅgitaiḥ aṅga bhaṅgaiḥ
tāvat tasya upari paripatari eva kāla pramuktā
prāleya ālī dhavala palita chadmanā vadhya mālā
kāle kāle kṣaṇa kalanayā moha nidrā vaśena

original: prāptaṃ nāsmin vapuṣi sukṛtaṃ naiva dattaṃ na bhuktaṃ /
analyzed: prāptam na asmin vapuṣi su kṛtam na eva dattam na bhuktam

original: itthaṃ caurair iva sa muṣitaś cintayaty eva duḥkhāt
analyzed: ittham cauraiḥ iva sa muṣitaḥ cintayati eva duḥkhāt
saṃmūḍhānām anuśaya phalaḥ saḥ vasāt apramādaḥ
tasmin yāte lalita vanitā puṣpa vallī vasante
duṣkarma āpta draviṇa tulayā yauvane svapna kalpe
naṣṭa aśeṣa prakṛtiḥ akhilaiḥ khedita aṅgaiḥ viraktaiḥ

original: rājyabhraṃśe nṛpa iva sukhaṃ so 'tha śocaty atītaṃ // KAvk_10.19 //
analyzed: rājya bhraṃśe nṛpaḥ iva sukham śocati atītam

original: āyur nītaṃ na ca samucitaṃ yācakāyopanītaṃ
analyzed: āyuḥ nītam na ca samucitam yācakāya upanītam

original: nāpy unnītaṃ diśi diśi yaśaḥ satpathaṃ na pratītaṃ
analyzed: na api unnītam diśi diśi yaśaḥ sat patham na pratītam
pītam yācñā viṣam adhigatam sphīta saṃtāpa śītam

original: bhītaṃ pāpāt kim api na mayā yat tad eva praṇītaṃ // KAvk_10.20 //
analyzed: bhītam pāpāt kim api na mayā yat tat eva praṇītam
kva asau hema druma ruci harā hāriṇī yauvana śrīḥ
kāyaḥ kva ayam kṛmi hata taru prāya vicchāya pākaḥ
dūrāt etāḥ parihṛta dṛśāḥ koṇa līnam taruṇyaḥ

original: śuṣkaṃ śītaṃ tarum iva vane vānaraṃ māṃ vadanti // KAvk_10.21 //
analyzed: śuṣkam śītam tarum iva vane vānaram mām vadanti

original: so 'yaṃ kāyaḥ śrayati vilayaṃ naiva māyānikāyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam kāyaḥ śrayati vilayam na eva māyā nikāyaḥ

original: srastāḥ sarve daśanamaṇayas te ca keśāḥ na doṣāḥ /
analyzed: srastāḥ sarve daśana maṇayaḥ te ca keśāḥ na doṣāḥ
gātra utsāhe praharati marut nā eva moha prarohe
kṣīṇasya iyam śayana śaraṇasya api tṛṣṇā kṣayā me
saṃcintya iti prasṛta viṣama śvāsa hikkā arditaḥ
sadyas tyaktum cira paricitām udyataḥ lokayātrām
mūki bhūtaḥ sva jana viraham dhyāyati dhvasta dhairyaḥ

original: śakticchedād ṛṇaṃ iva mahat prāptakālo daridraḥ // KAvk_10.23 //
analyzed: śakti chedāt ṛṇam iva mahat prāpta kālaḥ daridraḥ

original: bhūmiṃ gehaṃ vasu parijanaṃ putradārādi cānyat
analyzed: bhūmim geham vasu parijanam putra dāra ādi ca anyat
tāvat tāvat kalayati dhiyā prāṇa paryanta kāle

original: yāvaj janmany api punar asau snehamohānubandhais
analyzed: yāvat janmani api punar asau sneha moha anubandhaiḥ

original: tais tair antaḥ kṛtaparicayas tanmayībhāvam eti // KAvk_10.24 //
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ antar kṛta paricayaḥ tanmayībhāvam eti
duḥkham duḥsaha pāpa karma janitam kumbhī sahasra antare
bhuktvā raurava kālasūtra narakeṣu āvartate yoniṣu

original: yad vā puṇyakalārjitaṃ sukhapadaṃ tat saṃkṣaye duḥkhadaṃ
analyzed: yat vā puṇya kalā arjitam sukha padam tat saṃkṣaye duḥkha dam
sā anāgāmi phala āptaye vimala dhīḥ tasmāt samādhīyatām
iti bhīma bhava ambhodhi saṃtāraṇa kṛta vrataḥ
samādideśa bhagavān sattvānām kuśala āptaye

original: / iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ garbhāvakrāntinirdeśo nāma daśamaḥ pallavaḥ /
analyzed: iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyām garbhāvakrāntinirdeśaḥ nāma daśamaḥ pallavaḥ
